short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Kadoa Chrome extension offers Kadoa.com users a new and efficient way to configure their workflows.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kadoa makes it easy to scrape data from websites without any coding. Just click on what you need and Kadoa's AI web scraper will get the data for you.

---
How to use:

- Navigate to the webpage with data to extract
- Open the extension
- Select the data
- Review and refine suggested schema
- Your new workflow is ready.

To use Kadoa Chrome extension, you need to be logged in to your Kadoa account. 
On first launch, you will need to enter your API key. 

---
Compatibility:

The Kadoa extension is compatible with recent versions of Google Chrome browser and Chromium-based browsers (Vivaldi, Brave, etc).

---
Troubleshooting:

Q || The extension does not open.

A || This is most likely because the webpage has not yet finished loading. Please reload the page and wait until it’s fully loaded.

Q || I cannot change anything on a webpage after I opened the Kadoa extension.

A || Before clicking the Kadoa extension icon, make sure that the page has finished loading and all elements you want to select are visible (e.g. expand the collapsed areas, close any blocking popups, etc).

Q || I cannot select the element I need, it’s covered by nested elements.

A || Select any nested element, then click ↖ icon to select its parent element.

Q || The page reloads after I close the Kadoa extension.

A || This is an intended behavior. To make elements available for selection, Kadoa removes all event handlers from the page. To restore them, the page is reloaded.
